entry.title: Summit NOVA45PDC - 53" Ice Cream Dipping Cabinet - 8 Tubs
entry.summary:
Vendor: Summit
Type: Ice Cream Dipping Cabinets
Price: 2595.00

The Summit Commercial NOVA45PDC is an ice cream dipping cabinet that is 53" wide and can hold 8 tubs of ice cream on display (plus an additional 6 tubs underneath in storage). It is fully assembled with sneeze-guard, tub holder baskets, casters, and a digital thermostat, making this perfect for showcasing and serving your ice cream.

It has 14 cubic feet of space and meets NSF sanitation standards. The temperature range is wide: it can be between -25° to -5° Celsius (-13° and 23° Fahrenheit). It has two tempered-glass covers on ball-bearings that glide open and closed easily. And it is 100% CFC free for an environmentally-friendly design with no ozone-damaging chemicals.

      • Made in Denmark
      • Clear polycarbonate sneeze-guard
      • A keyed lock is included for optional use
      • White cabinet suits any setting
      • Casters are included for optional installation
      • Interior features a steel interior in a clean white finish
      • Includes 4 wire-tub holder baskets with plastic lids to hold eight 11" round (3 gallon) ice cream tubs
      • Holds an additional 6 tubs in storage underneath
      • Has a manual defrost cooling system with extra thick insulation and a drain

SPECS

Brand Summit Commercial
SKU NOVA45PDC
Dimensions (HWD) 45.5" x 53" x 27.25"
Capacity 14.1 cubic feet
Tub Capacity 8 display, 6 storage
Amps 7.2
Voltage 115
Weight 160 lb

WARRANTY

One year parts and labour warranty. Five year compressor warranty.

DOWNLOAD SPEC SHEET

entry.title: Omcan FR-CN-0460-S - 60" Ice Cream Dipping Cabinet - 10 Tubs
entry.summary:
Vendor: Omcan
Type: Ice Cream Dipping Cabinets
Price: 4345.00

The Omcan FR-CN-0460-S is a 60" wide ice cream dipping cabinet. This freezer has a flat sneeze guard and holds ten 3-gallon tubs of ice cream, with room for eight more in storage underneath. The FR-CN-0460-S has four casters so you can easily move the dip cabinet around to clean up. It has a standard NEMA 5-15 plug, so you can just plug it in and you're good to go.

      • Designed with sliding doors and locks for easy access
      • Exterior is made of durable white powder coated steel; pre-coated steel interior wall
      • Built-in lock for security
      • Grey plastics trim and door frames
      • Conveniently located near defrost drain

entry.title: Omcan FR-CN-0600 - 76" Commercial Chest Freezer - 20 Cu. Ft.
entry.summary:
Vendor: Omcan
Type: Chest Freezer
Price: 2103.00

The Omcan FR-CN-0600 is a commercial chest freezer designed for convenience stores, ice cream shops, supermarkets, and restaurants. It is 76" wide and comes with a standard NEMA 5-15 plug, so you can just plug it in and you're good to go.

It gives you 20 cubic feet of frozen space for your frozen goods, whether that be tubs of ice cream, novelties, chicken, or other foodstuff. It's been certified with cETLus and ETL Sanitation, so it's certified for commercial use across Canada.

      • Comes with two basket (fits a maximum of 6 baskets, sold separately)
      • Has two doors
      • Hinged lid design enables it to stay open while  loading and taking out items
      • Keeps your frozen products at the proper food storage temperature
      • Aluminum interior walls
      • Perfect for convenience stores, ice cream shops, supermarkets, and/or restaurants
      • Shipped on a pallet

SPECS

Item # 46505
Model FR-CN-0600
Capacity 20 cubic feet
Power 1/2+ HP
Refrigerant R290
Temperature range -15°C to -22°C (5°F to -8°F)
Electrical 115V, 60 Hz, 1Ph
Dimensions (WDH) 76" x 28" x 32.5"

NEMA Plug 5-15A

entry.title: Kelvinator KCCF210WH - 73.5" Commercial Chest Freezer - 22 Cu. Ft.
entry.summary:
Vendor: Kelvinator
Type: Chest Freezer
Price: 1547.00

The Kelvinator KCCF210WH commercial chest freezer was made with top quality materials in the USA: this machine is a sturdy freezer that is a great investment for your company for years to come. It can be great for storing your frozen goods or ice cream. This model also comes with interior lighting.

This chest freezer has a static condenser and a 1/4 horsepower compressor. And it offers you 22 cubic feet of frozen storage with a body just over 6 feet. This chest freezer is also Energy Star certified, which will end up saving you and the environment energy and money!

      • Energy Star Certified
      • Painted Steel Exterior & Interior
      • Mechanical Control
      • Internal Temperature Display Freezer Basket
      • Locking Lids & Key Protect the contents of the unit
      • Heavy Duty Casters
      • Interior lighting

entry.summary:

Type: Ice Cream Display Freezer

Looking to increase the sales of your frozen treats? The Omcan FR-CN-0460-R is an ice cream display chest freezer with a flat glass top. It's 60" wide and has 16.6 cubic feet of storage. This machine is great for ice cream parlours, convenience stores, and supermarkets. It fits two baskets and sits on four casters with brakes. It can be used for ice cream novelties or as a dipping cabinet.

entry.title: New Air NIF-41-FG - 41" Ice Cream Display Freezer - 8 Cu. Ft.
entry.summary:
Vendor: New Air
Type: Ice Cream Display Freezer
Price: 0.00

The New Air NIF-41-FG is a 41" wide ice cream display freezer, perfect for ice cream novelties. Its storage capacity is 8.4 cubic feet. On the top of the unit are sliding glass doors that allow for ease of access and viewing. Viewing is further enhanced by bright LED lighting.

This New Air ice cream cabinet comes equipped with anti-condensation and frosting technologies. The temperature is adjustable, and the refrigerant is R290. Ultimately, the NIF-41-FG is a great glass top freezer with the ability to showcase your products and store them at an ideal temperature.

      • 41" wide
      • LED lighting
      • Anti-condensation and frosting technologies
      • Adjustable temperature

CONTACT US FOR PRICING

Why don't we show the price for this item? Some manufacturers ask that we don't advertise their products below their required minimums. In order to offer you the best possible deal, we ask that you simply contact us to find out our great price.

entry.title: New Air NIF-41-DC - 41" Ice Cream Dipping Cabinet - 6 Tubs
entry.summary:
Vendor: New Air
Type: Ice Cream Dipping Cabinets
Price: 0.00

The New Air NIF-41-DC is a 41" ice cream dipping cabinet with a canopy, or sneeze guard. Its storage capacity is 8.4 cubic feet, and it fits 6 tubs of ice cream. On the top of the unit are sliding glass doors that allow for ease of use and viewing. Viewing is further enhanced by bright LED lighting.

This New Air ice cream cabinet comes equipped with anti-condensation and frosting technologies. The temperature is adjustable, and the refrigerant is R290. Ultimately, the NIF-41-DC is a great front of house merchandiser with the ability to store your products at an ideal temperature.

      • 41" wide
      • 18" sneeze guard
      • LED lighting
      • Anti-condensation and frosting technologies
      • Adjustable temperature

entry.summary:
Vendor: New Air
Type: Ice Cream Dipping Cabinets
Price: 0.00

The New Air NIF-60-DC is a 60" ice cream dipping cabinet with a canopy. It will give you 13 cubic feet of freezer space. It comes with 5 baskets, which can fit 10 tubs.

It's bright LED interior will allow for easy viewing. And with its detachable 18" canopy and mobile casters, the NIF-60-DC is perfect for showing off and serving your ice cream.
